channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Crow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- Crow

item.title: CVE-2023-26142|2023-09-12T05:00:01.235Z -- n%2Fa -- crow
item.description: All versions of the package crow are vulnerable to HTTP Response Splitting when untrusted user input is used to build header values. Header values are not properly sanitized against CRLF Injection in the set_header and add_header functions. An attacker can add the \r\n (carriage return line feeds) characters to end the HTTP response headers and inject malicious content.
